pr_title: GEODE-7864: Remove null checks that are not required.(Part 2)

timeline.bodyText:
Is this supposed to be "classPatterns.uisEmpty() ? 0 : classPatterns.hashCode()"
Anyways the hashCode for empty set returns 0. Not sure if there if there are any performance benefits.
timeline.author: agingade

replies.bodyText: I went with thinking that hashCode implementation of HashSet is implemented by JDK and hence it must be designed in the already optimized state.
replies.author: nabarunnag

replies.bodyText: Its also autogenerated code via the IDE
replies.author: nabarunnag

timeline.bodyText: Can be made simple by having OR condition between all 3 checks. Its up to you what style you want to follow.
timeline.author: agingade

timeline.message: GEODE-7864: Remove null checks that are not required.
GEODE-7864: Remove null checks that are not required.
